layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x44
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x44
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x28
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 784x28 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 782x26
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 782x22
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 388x22 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 197x18
                text run at (2,2) width 197: "Cell text should be left aligned"
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (392,2) size 388x22 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 197x18
                text run at (2,2) width 197: "Cell text should be left aligned"
